mapper.select: select tb.id, tb.type_id, tbt.name as typeName, tb.amount, tb.consumer, tb.remark, tb.consume_time, tb.create_time, tb.create_user_id from tbl_bill tb left join tbl_bill_type tbt on tbt.id = tb.type_id where 1=1 [[ and tb.remark like '%' || #remark# || '%' ]] [[ and tb.type_id = #typeId# ]] [[ and tb.consume_time >= #consumeTimeStart# ]] [[ and tb.consume_time < #consumeTimeEnd# ]]
select * from tbl_bill where 1=1 [[ and tb.type_id = #typeId# ]]
